list_definition.definition: to look at, or examine, carefully or formally

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The detective inspected the bloodstains on the carpet.

list_definition.definition: to visit (eg a restaurant or school) officially, to make sure that it is properly run

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Cafés must be regularly inspected to find out if they are kept clean.
The Queen will inspect the regiment.
